#summary AMFPHP service class documentation.

== Description ==

This class accesses user capabilities in the Moodle course context.

Necessary for managing what a particular user is allowed to do in the SWF Activity Module service classes.

----

== Methods ==

===get_capabilities()===
{{{
Access->get_capabilities($instance, $swfid);
}}}
Parameters:
{{{
$instance int - The course module ID
$swfid int - The SWF Activity Module instance ID
}}}

----

== Examples ==

Getting the capabilities object:
{{{
public function get_grades_by_course($obj)
{
	$capabilities = $this->access->get_capabilities($obj['instance'],$obj['swfId']);
}
}}}
Returns:
{{{
$capabilities->is_logged_in boolean
$capabilities->error string
$capabilities->course int
$capabilities->view_mod boolean
$capabilities->view_own_grades boolean
$capabilities->view_all_grades boolean
$capabilities->edit_grades boolean
}}}
